description:
OhmGraphite (open hardware monitor) is a Windows service that exposes hardware sensor data to a metric store, allowing one to create informative and beautiful dashboards in Grafana or another time series UI
    
    Created because windows-exporter not working good with thermal and fans, no gpu support.

    After installation you *MUST* check [README.md](https://github.com/nickbabcock/OhmGraphite/blob/master/README.md) to configure `OhmGraphite.exe.config`
    Config Path: `C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\ohmgraphite-exporter\tools`
author: nickbabcock
